entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
